name: DoubleTap
description: Stylish pistol action for the movie hero/dapper spy/assassin with a dark past that you don't want to talk about/cool person in all of us.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: HTC Vive Hardware Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: HTC Vive Hardware Required
